code: import React from"react";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";export default function Navigation(){var url=window.location.pathname;var tabActiveCreative=function tabActiveCreative(url){if(url.match(/create/gi)){return"tab-active";}};var tabActiveReview=function tabActiveReview(url){if(url.match(/review/gi)){return"tab-active";}};var tabActiveAll=function tabActiveAll(url){if(url.match(/all/gi)){return"tab-active";}};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"d-flex btn-group px-0",role:"group","aria-label":"navigation"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/create-answer",className:"btn btn-primary ".concat(tabActiveCreative(url))},"Create New"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/review-imagery",className:"btn btn-primary tab-seperator ".concat(tabActiveReview(url))},"Review"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Link,{to:"/all-cards",className:"btn btn-primary tab-seperator ".concat(tabActiveAll(url))},"All Cards"));}
